scenario.header: Can You Relate To Any Of These Scenarios?

scenarioCheck.label: You have a passion but don't know how to start a business and earn money
You no longer want to depend on your family or husband for financial support
You are feeling lost and facing an identity crisis and no clarity about life
You want to add another stream of income and support your family
Procrastination is keeping you away from achieving your dreams with your family
You are rebuilding your career after a long break but job options are slim

scenario.confirmation: If you ticked any of the above boxes, then this workshop is for you.

left.title: Where is the Workshop?
left.content: The Workshop will be hosted ONLINE on ZOOM & you can join from any part of the INDIA, from your mobile or laptop.

left.title: What is the date & time of the Workshop?
Will I get reminders before the Workshop begins?
left.content: Yes, you will be reminded via emails, SMS & WhatsApp.

right.title: Is there any fee to join?
right.content: The workshop is usually priced at ₹1999 offline but the online webinar is ₹99 & covers the same content.

right.title: Is this a one-way or interactive Workshop?
Is there a refund Policy?
right.content: Post attending this online workshop incase your are dissatisfied you can write an email to support@i2tym.in to request a refund.

whatWillChange.header: இந்த RMAS Beautician Course கற்றுக் கொள்வதால் ,  உங்கள் வாழ்க்கையில் என்ன மாற்றம் ஏற்படும் ?
sections: உங்களுக்கு இனிமேல் எந்த பண பிரச்சனையும் இருக்காது.
நீங்கள் சொந்தமாக அழகு நிலையம்(Beauty Parlour) தொடங்கலாம்
சொந்தமாக சுப நிகழ்ச்சிகளுக்கு  நீங்களே Beautician Makeup ஆர்டரை எடுக்கலாம்
உங்கள் வீட்டு நிகழ்ச்சிகளுக்கு  நீங்களே  'Makeup' செய்து கொள்ளலாம்
